Package edu.northeastern.csye.tms.controller

Class TaskController

java.lang.Object
edu.northeastern.csye.tms.controller.TaskController
@Controller public class TaskController extends Object
A controller class that handles requests related to tasks. This class handles requests related to tasks, such as adding, updating, and deleting tasks. It uses a UserRoleService to retrieve user roles, a TaskPulseService to persist and update task and pulse data, a ControllerUtils to retrieve pulses by ID, and an HttpSession to manage user sessions.

  • Method Details

    • allTasks

      @GetMapping("/tasks/view") public String allTasks()
      Retrieves all tasks. This method retrieves all tasks and renders the "all-tasks" view.
      Returns:
      a String representing the name of the "all-tasks" view

    • allUserTasks

      @GetMapping("/tasks/user/view") public String allUserTasks()
      Retrieves all tasks for the current user. This method retrieves all tasks for the current user and renders the "user-tasks" view.
      Returns:
      a String representing the name of the "user-tasks" view

    • updateTaskView

      @GetMapping("/tasks/update/view") public String updateTaskView(@RequestParam("id") int id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Retrieves the update-task view. This method retrieves the update-task view for a specified task and renders it. It also retrieves all users with the "ROLE_ADMIN" role if the current user has that role.
      Parameters:
      id - an int representing the ID of the task to update
      model - a Model instance used to add attributes to the view
      authentication - an Authentication instance representing the current user's authentication
      Returns:
      a String representing the name of the "update-task" view

    • addTaskView

      @GetMapping("/tasks/add/view") public String addTaskView(org.springframework.ui.Model model, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Displays the view for adding a new task.
      Parameters:
      model - an object that holds the model attributes for the view
      authentication - the authenticated user making the request
      Returns:
      a string that represents the name of the view to render

    • addTask

      @PostMapping("/tasks/add") public String addTask(@ModelAttribute("newTask") Task newTask, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Add a new task
      Parameters:
      newTask - the Task object to add
      request - the HttpServletRequest object for the request
      Returns:
      the view name to redirect to after adding the task

    • updateTask

      @PostMapping("/tasks/update") public String updateTask(@ModelAttribute Task task, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Updates a task with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      task - the updated Task object
      request - the HttpServletRequest object containing the user ID and pulse IDs
      Returns:
      a String representing the name of the view to redirect to after the update is complete

    • deleteTask

      @GetMapping("/tasks/delete") public String deleteTask(@RequestParam("id") int id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Deletes a task with the given ID from the system.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the task to be deleted
      model - the model used to pass data to the view
      Returns:
      the name of the view to be rendered after the task is deleted
